header.title: erl_docgen

appref.appsummary: The erl_docgen application is used to produce the OTP documentation.

description.p: The application consists of the following parts:

item.p: A number of XSL files that is used to transform the xml files to html, pdf or man pages.
The DTDs used for the OTP documentation.
Some scripts that is used to produce xml files according to OTP DTDs from some different input.
Erlang logo, javascripts and css stylesheets used in the documentation.
